website_summaries.verdict: Good price for a set of ice hockey pucks that work for practice or games.
pros: Perfectly made ice hockey pucks that meet all of the NCAA and NHL standards
Slides well on the ice, delivering proper game play
Stands up well to both repeated game and practice play, indoors or outdoors
cons: Grip on the sides of the pucks not quite as good as some others

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: So far they look fantastic. Havn't used them yet but will soon. i'm looking forward to using the pucks for practicing my stick handeling, and taking shots.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Pishko

customer_reviews.title: but work great under my 80 gallon air compressor and bench grinder ...
customer_reviews.text: They need some time to get rid of the smell, but work great under my 80 gallon air compressor and bench grinder pedestal.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D Jesser

customer_reviews.title: PUCKS MAKE GREAT LEG LEVELERS
customer_reviews.text: I don't play hockey, but saw a good idea online which use pucks as leg levelers on the bottom of carriage bolts. So, I figured I try a few to see if they'd work. I haven't completed my outfeed table, but they fit pretty well to this point.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good pucks
customer_reviews.text: Good, affordable pucks. We have an outdoor rink so we'll go through a lot of them until spring when the snow melts and we find them all again.
customer_reviews.author: Brave Sir Robin

customer_reviews.title: Yup. They are pucks.
customer_reviews.text: They are pucks...kinda hard to screw up. Got them to take to Isles games for autographs (along with a silver sharpie) and for use on jack stands, Seems like good quality, no labels or trademarks, just a black disc of rubber. Only docked a star for the strong rubber smell.
customer_reviews.author: mechengg

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but didn't use them for hockey
customer_reviews.text: Great, I stacked them to lift a office desk in my house @ two inches. Very stable, and they don't smell at all, like some other industrial rubber products (ever walked into a Harbor Freight store?)
customer_reviews.author: jimrno

customer_reviews.title: The pucks were glued to the legs of a bed ...
customer_reviews.text: The pucks were glued to the legs of a bed frame raising the frame approximately one inch which prevented the bedspread from dragging on the floor. They never came close to a hockey stick. They performed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Beggs

customer_reviews.title: Great to use as a base of safes and as a method to elevate my DVD player above the vents on my AV receiver.
customer_reviews.text: Great to use as a base of safes and as a method to elevate my DVD player above the vents on my AV receiver. Also great for use with jacks.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Pucks; The 'Swiss Army Knife' in the garage
customer_reviews.text: Many uses for these other than hockey. I repaired my snow-blower skids with them.
customer_reviews.author: CylonFan

customer_reviews.title: Jeepers best friend.
customer_reviews.text: Endless uses for bump stops, body lifts, etc... Great price and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Floaty.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality rubber
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rubber. Using them as lift pads for the vehicle lifts at our shop, they are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Good but stinky
customer_reviews.text: One star knocked off for pungent rubber odor. Smells really bad. Otherwise they're as described.
customer_reviews.author: cameraman12

customer_reviews.title: ... exactly what I expected & Rrived ...
customer_reviews.text: ...exactly what I expected & Rrived in a timely manner...
customer_reviews.author: CJo

customer_reviews.title: A box of hockey pucks not much to say. ...
customer_reviews.text: A box of hockey pucks not much to say. I'm using them as body mounts on my rat rod project.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price.
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and as advertised! Each one is individually wrapped too. What a great perk.
customer_reviews.author: JAZR

customer_reviews.title: Pucks for ice hockey...
customer_reviews.text: They work just fine... standard 6oz pucks. 12 pucks for ice hockey...
customer_reviews.author: Myles B Dyson

customer_reviews.title: All good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered hockey pucks and I received hockey pucks. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Good product. No concerns
customer_reviews.text: Pucks were delivered quickly and if my son shoots well, some of them actually end up in the goal!!!!! Good product. No concerns.
customer_reviews.author: MDG225

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: needed these for art project and couldn't find them locally THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Using for body spacers on a 4x4, cheaper alternative to spacers.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use as body lift for my 4x4, the 10 year old pucks were starting to crack, so going around and replacing a few to get another 10 years out of them... Unsure of how they are on the ice, not a hosehead...
customer_reviews.author: Craig's Garage

customer_reviews.title: Hockey Pucks
customer_reviews.text: They're Hockey pucks. Can't really mess these up. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Carano

customer_reviews.title: Missing 3 pucks send them so I don't have to return everything
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to return it if you can send 3 more pucks I won't
customer_reviews.author: Greig Isdale

customer_reviews.title: Great Audiophile Secret Better Performance At A Much Lower Price.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these 3 times before , from other Flea bay stores not realizing Amazon has a better product lower price and guaranteed. these pucks are great and perform much better than many isolators for Turntable isolation, CD player , Amplifier and certain Monitors/ Speakers with better performance at a 80- 90 % Percent lower price .Learned from Audiophile friends while station in Europe and England.
customer_reviews.author: Ricanguy007.

customer_reviews.title: They smell Great!  Other than that - well, they're Hockey Pucks
customer_reviews.text: I use these to give my garage that new tire smell. I also cut and drill them to use with the floor jack, and for other applications where parts need even pressure without a chance of slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

product_meta.title: Crown Sporting Goods Ice Hockey Pucks (Set of 12), 6-Ounce
product_meta.description: Play with the pucks the pros use. Measuring 3" in diameter, 1" thick, and weighing 166 grams, these ice hockey pucks are NHL-official. And, made from solid vulcanized rubber and manufactured to exacting standards of hardness and surface flatness, these pucks can stand up to NHL-official use and punishment. So don't settle for less: for softer, less smooth pucks. Choose Crown Sporting Goods and shoot harder, pass faster and more accurately, deke like Kane, and dangle like Datsyuk.
feature_bullets: Play with the puck the pros use; NHL official size and weight: 3" diameter, 1" thick, 166 grams
The vulcanized rubber material slides smoothly on ice, but the grippy, textured walls won't slide off your stick
Remarkable flatness, hardness and smooth surface quality for consistent, powerful and accurate shots and passes
